title: My Home (song)
text:
"My Home" is a single released by the Japanese boyband Kanjani8. This release is their 17th single. The single was used as the theme song for the TV Asahi drama, Inu wo Kau to Iu koto ~Sky to Waga ga Uchi no 180 Nichi ~.


== Track listing ==


=== Regular edition ===
"My Home" (マイホーム) (4:31)
"Baby Moonlight" (3:35)
"Futari no Hana" (二人の花, Our Flower) (3:35)
"Hanikami Oburicaado" (はにかみオブリガード, A Shy Obbligato) (3:16)
"My Home (Original Karaoke)" (マイホーム) (4:31)
"Baby Moonlight (Original Karaoke)" (3:35)


=== Limited edition ===
"My Home" (マイホーム) (4:31)
"Baby Moonlight" (3:35)
